title: post api contact form submission validation
description: Test the POST /api/contact endpoint to ensure it validates required fields (name, phone, region) and rejects requests missing any of these fields with a 400 status code.

title: post api contact phone number korean format validation
description: Verify that the POST /api/contact endpoint enforces the Korean phone number format using the specified regex pattern and returns a 400 error for invalid phone numbers.

title: post api contact successful inquiry submission
description: Test that a valid POST /api/contact request with all required fields and optional message saves the inquiry data correctly in the Supabase database and returns a 200 status code with a success message.

title: post api contact telegram notification sending
description: Verify that upon successful inquiry submission via POST /api/contact, a Telegram notification is sent to the designated chat without exposing bot tokens, and that failure to send notification does not affect the API response.

title: post api contact environment variable security
description: Ensure that the Telegram bot token and chat ID used in the POST /api/contact endpoint are loaded securely from environment variables and are not hardcoded in the source code.

title: post api contact error handling for server failures
description: Test that the POST /api/contact endpoint returns a 500 status code with an appropriate error message when there is a database or internal server error during inquiry submission.

title: post api contact optional message field handling
description: Verify that the POST /api/contact endpoint accepts requests with or without the optional message field and processes them correctly without errors.
